Title: Aric's Witch Hunters (and others) of Qud
Description:
Adds Templar Witch Hunters, deadly mutated templar to the game, who can spawn (rarely) wherever other templar do, or hunting espers across Qud.

Adds a short quest that will see you save a Napthaali shaman from the leader of these Witch Hunters.

And now for the others.

Adds Xenomorphs and Mind flayers as late game threats to the Moon Stair and Baroque Ruins respectively.
